languages.text: "Вы..." {n}Старик оборачивает к вам лицо, покрытое иссиня-черными венами. Его глаза выпучены и напоминают два огромных бельма — словно у дохлой рыбы. В ноздри ударяет терпко-сладкий запах, словно плоть старика гниет внутри истлевающей оболочки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Вы..." {n}Старик оборачивает к вам лицо, покрытое иссиня-черными венами. Его глаза выпучены и напоминают два огромных бельма — словно у дохлой рыбы. А терпко-сладкий запах ударяет в ноздри, словно плоть его гниет внутри истлевающей оболочки.{/n}

languages.text: "You..." {n}The old man shifts, revealing his face to you — it is threaded with jet-black veins, and his bulging, milky eyes bear a striking resemblance to those of a dead fish. A sickly sweet scent assaults your nostrils, as if the old man's flesh is rotting inside his decaying husk.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вы..." {n}Старик оборачивает к вам лицо, покрытое иссиня-черными венами. Его глаза выпучены и напоминают два огромных бельма — словно у дохлой рыбы. В ноздри ударяет терпко-сладкий запах, словно плоть старика гниет внутри истлевающей оболочки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You..." {n}The old man shifts, his face covered with jet black veins and milky eyes bulging. The opaque orbs give him a striking resemblance to a dead fish. Your nostrils are assaulted with a sickly sweet scent, as if his flesh was rotting inside the decaying husk.{/n}

"You..." {n}The old man shifts, his face covered with jet black veins and milky eyes bulging. The opaque orbs give him a striking resemblance to a dead fish. Your nostrils are assaulted with a sickly sweet scent, as if his flesh was rotting inside the decaying husk.{/n}

"You..." {n}The old man shifts, revealing his face to you — it is threaded with jet-black veins, and his bulging, milky eyes bear a striking resemblance to those of a dead fish. A sickly sweet scent assaults your nostrils, as if the old man's flesh is rotting inside his decaying husk.{/n}

"You..." {n}The old man shifts, revealing his face to you — it is threaded with jet-black veins, and his bulging, milky eyes bear a striking resemblance to those of a dead fish. A sickly sweet scent assaults your nostrils, as if the old man's flesh is rotting inside his decaying husk.{/n}

languages.text: “你……”{n}老人转过了身子，露出了他的脸。他的脸上布满了漆黑的血管，乳白色的眼睛高高鼓起，仿佛死鱼的眼睛。一股病态的甜味涌进了你的鼻孔里，仿佛这个老人从内到外都在腐烂一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You..." {n}The old man shifts, revealing his face to you — it is threaded with jet-black veins, and his bulging, milky eyes bear a striking resemblance to those of a dead fish. A sickly sweet scent assaults your nostrils, as if the old man's flesh is rotting inside his decaying husk.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你……”{n}老人转过了身子，露出了他的脸。他的脸上布满了漆黑的血管，乳白色的眼睛高高鼓起，仿佛死鱼的眼睛。一股病态的甜味涌进了你的鼻孔里，仿佛这个老人从内到外都在腐烂一样。{/n}

languages.text: «Usted...». {n}El anciano se mueve para mostrarte su rostro: está cubierto de venas completamente negras, y sus ojos blanquecinos y saltones recuerdan a los de un pez muerto. El empalagoso olor de la enfermedad azota tu olfato, como si la carne del hombre se estuviera pudriendo en el interior de su cuerpo decrépito.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You..." {n}The old man shifts, revealing his face to you — it is threaded with jet-black veins, and his bulging, milky eyes bear a striking resemblance to those of a dead fish. A sickly sweet scent assaults your nostrils, as if the old man's flesh is rotting inside his decaying husk.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Usted...». {n}El anciano se mueve para mostrarte su rostro: está cubierto de venas completamente negras, y sus ojos blanquecinos y saltones recuerdan a los de un pez muerto. El empalagoso olor de la enfermedad azota tu olfato, como si la carne del hombre se estuviera pudriendo en el interior de su cuerpo decrépito.{/n}

languages.text: 「あなたは…」{n}老人は体を動かし、あなたに顔を向ける。その顔には、漆黒の血管が張り巡らされ、膨らんだ乳白色の目は死んだ魚のそれに酷似している。朽ち果てた殻の中で老人の肉が腐っているかのような、病的に甘い香りがあなたの鼻孔を襲う。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You..." {n}The old man shifts, revealing his face to you — it is threaded with jet-black veins, and his bulging, milky eyes bear a striking resemblance to those of a dead fish. A sickly sweet scent assaults your nostrils, as if the old man's flesh is rotting inside his decaying husk.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは…」{n}老人は体を動かし、あなたに顔を向ける。その顔には、漆黒の血管が張り巡らされ、膨らんだ乳白色の目は死んだ魚のそれに酷似している。朽ち果てた殻の中で老人の肉が腐っているかのような、病的に甘い香りがあなたの鼻孔を襲う。{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr ..." {n}Der alte Mann dreht sich ein wenig und du siehst sein Gesicht. Es ist durchzogen von pechschwarzen Adern, und seine hervorstehenden, milchig trüben Augen ähneln auf unheimliche Weise denen eines toten Fischs. Ein widerwärtig süßlicher Geruch strömt dir in die Nase, als würde das Fleisch des alten Mannes in seiner verfallenen Hülle verwesen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You..." {n}The old man shifts, revealing his face to you — it is threaded with jet-black veins, and his bulging, milky eyes bear a striking resemblance to those of a dead fish. A sickly sweet scent assaults your nostrils, as if the old man's flesh is rotting inside his decaying husk.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr ..." {n}Der alte Mann dreht sich ein wenig und du siehst sein Gesicht. Es ist durchzogen von pechschwarzen Adern, und seine hervorstehenden, milchig trüben Augen ähneln auf unheimliche Weise denen eines toten Fischs. Ein widerwärtig süßlicher Geruch strömt dir in die Nase, als würde das Fleisch des alten Mannes in seiner verfallenen Hülle verwesen.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous... » {n}Le vieil homme se tourne et vous dévoile son visage, strié de veines d'un noir de jais. Ses yeux globuleux et vitreux ressemblent étrangement à ceux d'un poisson mort. Une odeur douceâtre et nauséabonde envahit vos narines, comme si la chair du navigateur était en pleine décomposition dans sa carcasse décatie.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You..." {n}The old man shifts, revealing his face to you — it is threaded with jet-black veins, and his bulging, milky eyes bear a striking resemblance to those of a dead fish. A sickly sweet scent assaults your nostrils, as if the old man's flesh is rotting inside his decaying husk.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous... » {n}Le vieil homme se tourne et vous dévoile son visage, strié de veines d'un noir de jais. Ses yeux globuleux et vitreux ressemblent étrangement à ceux d'un poisson mort. Une odeur douceâtre et nauséabonde envahit vos narines, comme si la chair du navigateur était en pleine décomposition dans sa carcasse décatie.{/n}

languages.text: "Sen." {n}Döndüğünde, ihtiyar adamın oltu taşı kadar siyah damarlarla kaplı yüzünü görüyorsun. Süt beyazı pörtlek gözleri, tıpatıp ölü balıklarınkilere benziyor. Burnuna mide bulandıracak denli tatlı bir koku hücum ediyor. Âdeta ihtiyarın eti, dökülmekte olan derisinin altında çürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You..." {n}The old man shifts, revealing his face to you — it is threaded with jet-black veins, and his bulging, milky eyes bear a striking resemblance to those of a dead fish. A sickly sweet scent assaults your nostrils, as if the old man's flesh is rotting inside his decaying husk.{/n}
